thread.title: Police Investigating Serious Vandalism at Jewish Cemetery in Missouri
thread.title_full: Police Investigating Serious Vandalism at Jewish Cemetery in Missouri

author: Josh Feldman
title: Police Investigating Serious Vandalism at Jewish Cemetery in Missouri
text:
Police Investigating Serious Vandalism at Jewish Cemetery in Missouri by Josh Feldman | 6:41   
Authorities are investigating the vandalism that took place at a Jewish cemetery in University City, Missouri. 
KTVI’s Andy Banker reported that the vandalism was discovered today around the time that Jewish centers around the country were evacuated due to threats . 
Over 100 headstones were reportedly damaged , and police have said it’s not clear yet whether this was a hate crime. 
Watch KTVI’s report above.
